subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Question for everyone
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Very true, Frank!  The ghosts who are producing the EVP's certainly don't 
have brains. :-)

I have no doubt that there may be a few people around who could create EVP 
phenomena in an electrronic device, but it would be an extremely small 
number. I think most of the EVP we get are from disembodied beings who 
have figured out how to do it.

Zack

On Mon, 17 Sep 2007, Frank Sumption wrote:

>
> It's not brain! We are all spirit, of course we can create our own EVPs. You don't suddenly become spirit when you die, you just wake up. That's why I don't ask questions, I don't want to create the answers I'm looking for.
>
> Frank-S
